shorts.title: Charles Hangen Joins Fidelity Bank as Senior Vice President and Chief Risk Officer
shorts.title_distilled: Charles Hangen Joins Fidelity Bank as Senior Vice President and Chief Risk Officer.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, Pa., Nov. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Daniel J. Santaniello, President and CEO of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce that Charles Hangen has joined Fidelity Bank as SVP, Chief Risk Officer.
shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Nov. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Daniel J. Santaniello, President and CEO of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce that Charles Hangen has joined Fidelity Bank as SVP, Chief Risk Officer.

shorts.content: The WEJL Radio tower lighting is just one part of the night before Thanksgiving in Scranton. It's also one of the busiest nights of the year for bars in the city.

shorts.title: Family to Family Food Basket Program returns to downtown Scranton

shorts.title: Annual WEJL tower lighting lights up Scranton
shorts.title_distilled: Annual WEJL tower lighting lights up Scranton.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU)— Hundreds gathered in downtown Scranton for a yearly Thanksgiving Eve tradition. Each year, the lighting of the WEJL draws large crowds to downtown Scranton, and this year was no different. 28/22 News reporter Avery Nape was there for much of the evening. He brings us that story. shorts.title: Annual drive-thru Thanksgiving benefitting less fortunate
shorts.title_distilled: Annual drive-thru Thanksgiving benefitting less fortunate.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU)— It is an act of kindness that's been happening in Lackawanna County for decades, which took place this morning. In the purist form of generosity, hundreds of volunteers donated their time to those less fortunate. 28/22 News reporter Connor Coar was in Scranton to look at the gratitude firsthand. A number of [...]
